column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Crab avocado appetizer is one of the best in the universe! Â Don't be put off by the large size. All steaks are incredible and the seafood is amazing quality and preparation as well. Sides are beyond delicious and you can taste all the yummy ingredients. You'll want to order at least two
column2: you can always take take home leftovers.
